name: mod
description: Base command for all things moderation-related

options.name: kick
options.description: Kick a person from the server. Requires Kick Members permission.

options.name: reason
options.description: Why is the user being kicked?

options.name: ban
options.description: Ban a person from the server. Requires Ban Members permission.

options.name: reason
options.description: Why is the user being banned?
